author: Matt (Artano)
title: Artano - The NFT Art Marketplace
description: Many NFT marketplaces do not put users first: they have high commission fees, they are hard to navigate, heavily curated and centralized
solution: An NFT marketplace that is user-driven, open to all and fraud-resistant. We want to build a community, not just a product!
experience: Team of 4 developers, 1 business/financial analyst, 1 designer, 1 content manager, 1 product manager. Built Ethereum and Cardano solutions.
